thread.title: Zombie Slayer mod looking for a Mac Tester

post.author: bhenderson
post.body:
Since Zombie Slayer has a release date of April 25, we need to make sure the Mac build works.

If you have a Mac, please complete the following three steps:

1.) Download the Mac build: http://www.zslayer.com/files/mac.pk4

2.) Install the pre-alpha Zombie Slayer demo: http://www.zslayer.com/files/zs_demo.zip and copy the Mac build over to the installed Zombie Slayer directory

3.) Reply here letting me know if it worked or not for you.

Thanks!

post.author: bhenderson
post.body:
I'm surprised no one noticed the release date. This is the first place I have posted it.

The Mac version will be included in the mod, but it is untested and therefore will be unsupported.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: I noticed but don't have a mac.

post.author: bhenderson
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
I noticed but don't have a mac.


Not many people have a Mac, haha (plus Doom3 for Mac is still going for top dollar). I assume everything will work because the Linux and Windows versions seem okay, but it would be nice to be sure...

post.author: Neurological
post.body: I can't point to you a guy that may be able to test on Mac if you want. Let me know .

post.author: bhenderson
post.body:
Neurological wrote:
I can't point to you a guy that may be able to test on Mac if you want. Let me know .


Awesome, thanks! Can you have him follow the directions that are in the top post?

post.author: meowykid
post.body: Ill test

post.author: meowykid
post.body:
works
But like the time given to press the button is like 1 second

post.author: bhenderson
post.body: Sounds right (I tweaked the button press time in the final version). Thanks.
